name: Color Balls - Lines
description:
It is classic Color Lines game and one of the most interesting and addictive puzzle game! This is a very fun and easy game to play but hard to master!

Your task is to score as many points as possible by making lines of one color balls (5 or more) in any direction.
Move balls to make vertical, horizontal or diagonal color lines a make the best score.

Color Balls is a good brain trainer for you or for your children (or friends).

Features:
- great HD graphics
- cool music and sfx effects
- 3 difficulty levels
- undo option
- automatic save game
- and more..
